chunk:
Excuse My Frank Rebalancing Emulsion

Brand: Excuse My Frank

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: WATER(AQUA), GLYCERIN, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, BETAINE, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, ROSA CENTIFOLIA FLOWER WATER, CARBOMER, CHLORPHENESIN, TROMETHAMINE, ALLANTOIN, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, SODIUM HYALURONATE, DISODIUM EDTA, OENOTHERA BIENNIS (EVENING PRIMROSE

IS (EVENING PRIMROSE) OIL, TOCOPHEROL

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
